content: ***this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** **difficulty ** intermediate/advanced **materials needed ** 5 mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 250-275 yards #4 worsted weight red heart soft in off-white yarn needle scissors blocking board optional **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet fpsc = front post single_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet fptr = front post treble_crochet blo = back loop only space s = space s **additional terms ** picot single_crochet = insert hook yo pull up a loop yo draw through 1 loop 3 times to make a chain 3 then yo and draw through last loop on the hook 3-double_crochet cluster = dc3tog in same stitch small puff st = yo pull up a loop 3 times in same st yo pull through 6 loops yo pull through final 2 loops puff st = yo pull up a loop 4 times in same st yo pull through 8 loops yo pull through final 2 loops **measurements ** 12 x 12 **gauge ** my circle measured a little over 3 1/4 across after round 6
